doc:
Richard France (writer) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_France_(writer) 0 Richard France (born May 5, 1938) is an American playwright, author, and film and drama critic. He is a recognized authority on the stage work of American filmmaker Orson Welles. His publication, The Theatre of Orson Welles, which received a CHOICE Outstanding Academic Book Award in 1979, has been called "a landmark study" and has been translated into Japanese. His 1990 companion volume, Orson Welles on Shakespeare has been praised by Welles critics and biographers. Richard_France ( born May_5_,_1938 ) is an_American_playwright , author , and film_and_drama_critic . He is a_recognized_authority on the_stage_work of American_filmmaker_Orson_Welles . His_publication , The_Theatre of Orson_Welles , which received a_CHOICE_Outstanding_Academic_Book_Award in 1979 , has_been_called " a_landmark_study " and has_been_translated into Japanese . His_1990_companion_volume , Orson_Welles on Shakespeare has_been_praised by Welles_critics_and_biographers .
